name: barcode-generator
description: 在线条形码生成工具（Web-based Barcode Generator）

scripts.check:port: node -e "const net = require('net'); const port = process.env.PORT || 3000; const server = net.createServer(); server.once('error', (err) => { console.log(err.code === 'EADDRINUSE' ? `❌ Port ${port} is occupied! Kill the process first.` : err.message); process.exit(err.code === 'EADDRINUSE' ? 1 : 0); }).once('listening', () => { server.close(); console.log(`✅ Port ${port} is available`); process.exit(0); }).listen(port);"
scripts.kill:port: node -e "const net = require('net'); const port = process.env.PORT || 3000; net.connect({port}, () => { console.log(`Killing process on port ${port}...`); require('child_process').exec(`lsof -t -i:${port} | xargs kill -9`, (err) => { err ? console.log('Process not found') : console.log(`✅ Port ${port} released`); }); }).on('error', () => { console.log(`Port ${port} is not occupied`); });"
